short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for Accountz sales co-pilot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accountz is a sales co-pilot for Account Executives which helps them do their day-to-day tasks using AI. The Chrome Extension for Accountz gathers prospect data from specific websites, such as Crunchbase, G2, etc, based on the configuration done by the user and enables them to run AI based actions on it. For example, the extension may be used to read G2 reviews for a prospect and then find and summarize all the negative reviews.

Accountz is the perfect companion for an Account Executive, to ensure that those Opportunities move to Closed Won.
